title: Introducing: Machines:
body:
Joining the ranks of nigh on Google-proof bands such as ∆ and !!! comes **Machines:**, a five-piece cloud-step collective quietly biding their time on the South East London scene.

The genius of **Machines:** rests on the devastatingly sublime vocals of Caragh Campbell, whilst a heavy dose of glitching synth and solid double bass stops the whole thing from getting too ethereal.

Following on from recent support slots for Bat and Ball and FEMME, plus a launch-party show at the pop-up record store 310 NXRoad, **Machines:** are out to prove there’s plenty of life south of the river. Check out standout tracks ‘On This Spot’ and ‘Stuck’ for some ice-cold calm as the nights draw in.

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/109705857″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
